title: Battle of Stalingrad Educational Resource (WWII - Docus, Books)
description:
What we have here is as many documentaries, films, audiobooks, and E-book (battle maps, weapons encyclopedias, etc) of the WWII Battle of Stalingrad as I could find from multiple sources ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ Thanks to the OPs. This should turn anyone into quite the expert. Think of it as one-stop shopping. The quality on some of this is a bit mixed, but I have included video notes and screenshots of all titles.
